website_summaries.verdict: Offers a wide array of soldering tools that are good for both the novice and more advanced solderer.
pros: Thirty pieces in all, including a 60-watt, 110-volt soldering iron, stand, tips, knife with multiple blades, desoldering pump, and more
Iron heats up fast and has adjustable temperature, from 200 to 450 degrees Celsius
cons: Assembled stand won't fit into the case, so you have to assemble and disassemble it for every use

customer_reviews.title: I'm a hero now
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to soldering and electronics and to be honest wasn't really sure what equipment to get. I took a chance and got the Volador Technology 30 in 1 kit. I recently had to open up and solder some cables back together and this provided everything I needed. This is a beginner quality kit but that doesn't mean it won't get the job done. The case is so cute too.. Yeah, I said it. Cute. It looks like it a giant tool box, but miniature. My gf said it was "cute", then I fixed a pair of her headphones, and then she called me her HERO. This kit will help you go from "geek" to "HERO".
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bundle
customer_reviews.text: The iron itself heats quickly, and the temp adjustment gives a good range. The tools & extras turn out to be much more useful than expected, and I love that it's all folded into a convenient little box. While everything was sturdy and effective, the aesthetic quality did seem minimal; has a plasticy feel to it. I also felt the selection of tips could have included more options for smaller arduino-type projects. A sharp, tiny chisel tip would have been spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Emily.L

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's Christmas request
customer_reviews.text: Looked at reviews for a variety of soldering kits, and this one kept showing up as a good choice. My 16 year old grandson is very happy with it. I bought various accessories ( a silicone mat, magnifier with clips to hold the work, etc) to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit....it arrived on time and was just as represented. It has more than paid for itself just in the repairs to my amplifier and cords which were down, but now are out doing shows with me. Not any special skill needed, all the tools for repair are there and you can save yourself so many dollars by doing what others would charge you for!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money great customer service though
customer_reviews.text: After seeing my review customer service reached out to me offered to refund my money. The kit might not be the best but they do have good customer service. My original review is below. Everything is made of horribly brittle plastic. The tip of the iron lasted for about 30-50 solder joints before it corroded to the point of being unusable. I realize this is a cheap kit and you get what you pay for to a certain extent but this product is a waste of everyone’s time both manufacturer and customer alike.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Has almost everything needed to get the job done. I added a pocket digital multimeter and a can of rosin flux to mine to make it truly grab & go. The little case perfectly keeps everything together in 1 place without taking up much room. I suggest practicing with the soldering iron on junk boards to get the temp right before moving on to the actual workpiece. Lots of tools to choose from while working. Replaced 4 pots on a bad power supply the first day saving me $100. So far I'm really happy with this purchase. Thank you Volador.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Positive experience
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy about it considering it is a beginner set and I am a completeltly beginner, the case has some small boxes to hold some little thingys I really like, my first project is to solder some little stuff I learned from youtube, so far it looks quite worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit for the Novice Who Wants to Learn More
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice soldering kit for someone who is just getting into electronics and trying to learn how the different tools and instruments work. It is nothing too complicated. It is also very compact in size which is great for someone who doesn't have a lot of space available. If someone wants to learn how to solder or just thinks that he or she would like to try to learn more about repairing electronics and doing soldering in the correct way then this is a great kit to have. The price is not bad either for all that you get.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S

customer_reviews.title: Great soldering kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for soldering. Has everything you need for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: mine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner kit with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for beginners. Has everything you need. The solder gun is cheap but works fine. I definitely recommend for beginner looking for a kit with everything. I would not recommend for intermediate or above. Now that I have the kit I will probably get a better soldering gun. I would buy again, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. It is cheap but it is actually a decent quality. Has a lot of useful tools in it. The box is cheap and a clip broke the first time I used it. With that said I would recommend this kit in a heartbeat. It does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.author: Jade Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit for beginners or experts!
customer_reviews.text: Solder Iron works great and faster than others that I purchased before and all other tools are really useful and box size is very compact and it has enough space for everything and more!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Zumbado Zamora

customer_reviews.title: I really like it includes a case
customer_reviews.text: I really like it includes a case. I don't like that when its assembled (Base+Coil Stand), it doesn't fit in the case. In short, the case is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this producy
customer_reviews.text: thid product broke after a few months of use. customer service does not reply to email, and their website does not have this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Soldering Kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit. has everything I needed and more, great addition to my tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Farley Scott Orndorff

customer_reviews.title: I think it could be a good fit. If there is a multimeter inside of ...
customer_reviews.text: As an electrical engineer, I think it could be a good fit. If there is a multimeter inside of the box, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a bit and now take on repairs I wouldn't have done before. Gets plenty hot, doesn't turn itself off, and has nice collection of tips. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Just Mark

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. Somewhat cheap, but does the job. I used it for a stippling job on my gun and it worked fine. Switching out the heads was difficult once hot, but with tools it’s manageable. If you’re not looking for top class this will do the job just fine. Comes with many other scrapers and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice it was and what was included for the price. Has worked prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: mediocre but after some research it's overpriced you can buy them individually and save money
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahem0g

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool kit for the micro repairman
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool kit for the micro repairman. My husband purchased it to repair his drone. He said it will come in very useful on future repairs of numerous items.
customer_reviews.author: sandra m. green, amc inc.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this kit a few times now and have very little complaints. Definitely would recommend. The only thing I added was an inline switch as the set did not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Visionary hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: I like it worked good for what I needed to go and has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Not bad kit for the price has everything you need and the case is nice for storing all your soldering tools and has room to add a few more soldering things if you need to
customer_reviews.author: Shaun W

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner this is a great soldering iron kit. My boyfriend loves it and tried it on his computer tower works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for a beginer
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for a beginer, has everything you need and price is reasonable! It comes with a little box which easy to storage everything. Very useful kit.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: it works well and I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Picture showed an ON/ OFF switch on iron. It wasn't there. Other than that, it works well and I am pleased with it. I have used it and it done well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lee Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the kit yet, but it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, has a lot of options works great would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: It is nice set of tools in a nice box
customer_reviews.text: It is nice set of tools in a nice box. A solder heats up quickly, in 20-30 seconds. The box had initial strong smell (disappeared in few days), hence 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Vdk

customer_reviews.title: Love the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Love all the accessories. Only wish the snipers were a little better quality. But good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. It comes with a compact tool box carrying case. All of the items are nice quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kit for small soldering. Gave me everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: t-anna carter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of stuff in the kit, however materials and craftsmanship are very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Webster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. Iron heats up quick to. Great price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: The soldering iron works well and came with excellent documentation. Great value
customer_reviews.text: All components delivered as promised. The soldering iron works well and came with excellent documentation. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it in open area
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it but happy with purchase can’t wait to see how it works will report quality once I use it
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Morales

product_meta.title: Soldering Iron Kit, Volador 30 in1 60W Temperature Control Solder Iron, 5pcs Soldering Tips, Desoldering Pump, Tweezers, Wick, Soldering Iron Stand with Cleaning Sponge and Tool Case
feature_bullets: [Complete Soldering Kit] - VOLADOR Soldering iron kit comes with 60W 110V soldering iron gun, 5 multiple soldering tips, desoldering pump, stand, with cleaning sponge, copper wire, insulation tape, scissors, screwdrivers(electric pen), knife with 6 pcs blades, tin wire tube, 2 tweezers, 6 different soldering assistive tools and portable carrying case.

[Heat Up Fast & Heat Dissipation Fast] - 60 watts, with upgraded chip fixed resistor technology makes the electric soldering iron heat up quickly (1-2 minutes). Adjustable temperature with thermostat range 200~450℃ (392-842℉). Upgraded heat resistant material and the steel-pipe four ventilation holes on the soldering tools design helps heat dissipation.

[Premium Solder Wick & Desoldering Pump] - 2.0mm wide, 1.5m length solder wick is easy to clean residue flux. The desoldering pump is high pressure vacuum tube with aluminum body, which allows easy one-handed operation. Great for removing solder from PCB through hole solder joints.
[Easy to Storage & Carry Tool Box] - The tool box is rather convenient to store small tools and easy to carry. Never worry losing soldering iron gun and accessories again.

[Wide Applications] - The soldering iron kits are the best gift for DIY enthusiast to repair cell phone, tablet, PC, TV, radio, remote control vehicles, toys of your children, jewelry, music instrument, craft, etc.

specifications.Manufacturer: Shen Zhen Qian Hai Wo Lan De Ke Ji You Xian Gong Si
